summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3070, for the improvement of Greenwood Avenue, from North Fiftieth Street to North Fifty-second Street, on the east, and from North Fifty-second street on the west to North Fifty-seventh Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 37276 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
